articles.author: Jeanine Santucci, Doyle Rice, Joel Shannon, Cybele Mayes-Osterman
articles.title: Thanksgiving travel weather forecast: Here's where to expect snow - USA TODAY
articles.description: Millions of Americans are traveling for the Thanksgiving holiday, and — unlike earlier this week — the weather is set to mostly cooperate.
articles.content:
Millions of Americans are hitting the road and boarding flights over the Thanksgiving holiday, and unlike earlier this week the weather is set to mostly cooperate.
